content:
In our last call we discussed implementing the International Patient Access for the Nordics. As I understand, this would essentially involve adapting the US Argonaut specifications to our region. Taking the US Core as the basis for harmonized data set, for instance, and adjusting things like names, race, etc. for our local context. And most likely also discussing our preferences on how apps are certified, etc
We would appreciate input from the HL7 on how to set up a FHIR Accelerator. At least @Grahame Grieve should be interested in this, right?
I think that you don't need an accelarator - that's mainly a US thing around corporate alignment. Do you all have HL7 affiliates?
Yes, we do. Happy to chat about possibilities to best organize this.
